pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rbi_mlHelps build better ml workflow with... * `kedro` for project structure management, * `pytorch-lightning` for model training, * `wandb` and `mlflow` for experiment tracking and management, * Other utility tools to help handle aws services and miscellaneous tasksSource code can be found here: https://gitlab.com/rbibigdata/mldp/rbi-ml/-/tree/rbi_ml_package
